info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:59PM EDT until July 29 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CUMBERLAND AND WESTERN POWHATAN COUNTIES... At 658 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ballsville, or 7 miles west of Powhatan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Powhatan, Ballsville, Macon, Trenholm, Hatchers, Jefferson, Belona, Provost, Lake Powhatan, Clinton, and Worshams. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
